DESCRIPTION: Calculates the convective heat transfer coefficient for a solar cell using the appropriate correlation. Part 1 of 2.

Outlines the procedure to solve convection problems.
Presents an example of a thermal boundary layer problem of a fluid over a flat plate.

SCREENCAST_TITLE: Blasius Solution for the y-Component of Velocity

DESCRIPTION: Calculates the surface temperature for a cylinder in cross flow with radial convective heat transfer using the Zukauskas correlation. Second of three screencasts using the same initial problem but using different correlations to solve.

DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates free convection over a heated horizontal plate using an example

DESCRIPTION: Explanation of why a PFR behaves as a large number of CSTRs in series, or as a system of small batch reactors moving down a tube.

Discusses details of the energy balance for a tubular reactor and the energy balance for coolant in an annular region around tubular reactor. Part 2 of 2.
